mapper.select: SELECT q.id, q.restaurant_id, r.name as restaurant_name, q.user_id, q.user_name, q.user_email, q.question, q.answer, q.status, q.is_owner, q.is_resolved, q.is_active, q.created_at, q.answered_at, q.updated_at FROM restaurant_qna q LEFT JOIN restaurants r ON q.restaurant_id = r.id WHERE r.owner_id = #{ownerId} AND q.is_active = 1 ORDER BY q.created_at DESC

SELECT q.id, q.restaurant_id, r.name as restaurant_name, q.user_id, q.user_name, q.user_email, q.question, q.answer, q.status, q.is_owner, q.is_resolved, q.is_active, q.created_at, q.answered_at, q.updated_at FROM restaurant_qna q LEFT JOIN restaurants r ON q.restaurant_id = r.id WHERE q.restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} AND q.is_active = 1 ORDER BY q.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restaurant_qna (restaurant_id, user_id, user_name, user_email, question, answer, status, is_owner, is_resolved, is_active) VALUES (#{restaurantId}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{question}, #{answer}, #{status}, #{isOwner}, #{isResolved}, #{isActive})
mapper.update: UPDATE restaurant_qna SET answer = #{answer}, status = 'ANSWERED', answered_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{qnaId}
UPDATE restaurant_qna SET is_resolved = #{isResolved}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{qnaId}
